title: travelplanner: Could you create a 5-day travel plan for me, beginning in Washington, visiting 2 cities in Virginia from March 15th to March 19th, 2022? I have a budget of $2,200 for this trip. (825c2129557fd9df)

always_included_messages.content:
Based on the user's query, make the best travel plan for the user and save it. Do not ask follow-up questions.
Use your best judgement in finding alternatives if possible. Don't give up - ALWAYS save a plan with the `submit_day_plan` function for each day of the trip!

chat_history.name: restaurant_search

chat_history.content:
# Day 1

## Getting there
On March 15th, you can fly from Washington to Richmond for $43.

## Accommodation
For the night, you can stay in a private room in Richmond at 2 bd 2 bathroom Apartment in Upper East Side for $285. The accommodation is centrally located and has air conditioning and heating.

## Lunch
After checking in, you can head to Mother's Kitchen for lunch. It's a local restaurant with an average cost of $46, serving Mexican, fast food, and Chinese cuisine.

## Afternoon
After lunch, you can spend the afternoon exploring the Virginia Museum of Fine Arts, which is a short walk from your accommodation.

## Dinner
For dinner, you can visit the highly-rated restaurant The Spot, which serves Indian, BBQ, and seafood dishes at an average cost of $17.

## Evening
After dinner, you can take a leisurely walk to Canal Walk, a scenic promenade along the James River that offers beautiful views of the city. It's a great place to relax and enjoy the evening atmosphere.

## Day 1 budget
The cost of the day's activities is $351.

# Day 2

## Morning
Start your day at one of Richmond's historic sites, Agecroft Hall & Gardens, a Tudor-style mansion and gardens.

## Lunch
For lunch, visit the highly-rated Sandpiper Restaurant & Lounge. It offers a variety of cuisines, including tea, cafe, desserts, and seafood.

## Afternoon
After lunch, head to the Virginia State Capitol, an iconic building in the heart of Richmond.

## Dinner
In the evening, try out a new restaurant, Guang Zhou Chinese Restaurant, which offers a variety of cuisines, including Chinese, Indian, and American, with an average cost of $84.

## Evening
After dinner, you can take a stroll along the James River and enjoy the scenic views of the city at night.

## Day 2 budget
The cost of the day's activities is $175.

# Day 3

## Travel to Charlottesville
You can drive from Richmond to Charlottesville, a journey of 70.5 miles. It is not possible to provide an accurate travel time for this journey, as this would depend on the mode of transport.

## Accommodation
When you arrive in Charlottesville, you can stay at the Peaceful Spacious 1 Bdrm Apt in Carroll Gardens for $611.

## Lunch
After checking in, you can have lunch at Mama's Fish House, a highly-rated restaurant offering tea, pizza, desserts, and fast food.

## Afternoon
In the afternoon, explore the Virginia Discovery Museum, which offers interactive exhibits and activities for all ages.

## Dinner
For dinner, try Restaurant Andre, a highly-rated restaurant serving desserts, tea, BBQ, fast food, and Chinese cuisine.

## Evening
After dinner, you can stroll through the historic Downtown Mall, which features unique shops, restaurants, and entertainment venues.

## Day 3 budget
The cost of the day's activities is $924.

# Day 4

## Morning
Start your day at Monticello, a historic estate with beautiful architecture and gardens.

## Lunch
For lunch, you can try out Domino's Pizza, a well-known pizza chain in the area.

## Afternoon
After lunch, visit Saunders-Monticello Trail, a scenic trail that offers beautiful views of the surrounding mountains and forests.

## Dinner
In the evening, head to Sandys Cocktails & Kitchen, a highly-rated restaurant serving tea, pizza, BBQ, Indian, and seafood.

## Evening
After dinner, you can enjoy a relaxing evening at Ix Art Park, an outdoor art park with sculptures and installations.

## Day 4 budget
The cost of the day's activities is $208.

# Day 5

## Morning
On the final day, visit The Rotunda, a historic building on the campus of the University of Virginia.

## Lunch
For lunch, enjoy a meal at The Tongue Twister, a highly-rated restaurant serving pizza, French, bakery, cafe, and seafood.

## Afternoon
After lunch, explore the Freedom of Speech Wall, a unique attraction in the city.

## Dinner
Celebrate the final night of your trip by heading to Mama's Fish House again, where you can enjoy their delicious tea, pizza, desserts, and fast food.

## Evening
After dinner, you can take a leisurely walk around the historic Downtown Mall for some last-minute shopping and sightseeing.

## Day 5 budget
The cost of the day's activities is $153.

## Total trip budget
The total budget for this trip is $1,711, which is within your budget of $2,200.

functions.name: accommodation_search
functions.desc:
Discover accommodations in your desired city.
Example: accommodation_search("Rome") would present a list of hotel rooms in Rome.

city.description: The name of the city where you're seeking accommodation.

functions.name: attraction_search
functions.desc:
Find attractions in a city of your choice.
Example: attraction_search("London") would return attractions in London.

city.description: The name of the city where you're seeking attractions.

functions.name: city_search
functions.desc:
Find cities in a state of your choice.
Example: city_search("California") would return cities in California.

state.description: The name of the state where you're seeking cities.

functions.name: flight_search
functions.desc:
A flight information retrieval tool.
Example: flight_search("New York", "London", "2022-10-01") would fetch flights from New York to London on October 1, 2022.

departure_city.description: The city you'll be flying out from.

destination_city.description: The city you aim to reach.

date.description: The date of your travel in YYYY-MM-DD format.

functions.name: google_distance_matrix
functions.desc:
Estimate the distance, time and cost between two cities.
Example: google_distance_matrix("Paris", "Lyon", "self-driving") would provide driving distance, time and cost between Paris and Lyon.

origin.description: The departure city of your journey.

destination.description: The destination city of your journey.

functions.name: restaurant_search
functions.desc:
Explore dining options in a city of your choice.
Example: restaurant_search("Tokyo") would show a curated list of restaurants in Tokyo.

city.description: The name of the city where you're seeking restaurants.

functions.name: submit_day_plan
functions.desc:
Once you have collected information about the trip, call this function once for each day of the trip, starting on day 1.
If a field does not apply for a given day, use "-" to indicate this.
You MUST call this function to save the plan for each query.

current_city.description: The city for this day. If the plan is to travel between two cities, indicate it as "from A to B" (e.g. "from Ithaca to Charlotte").

transportation.description: e.g. "Flight Number: F3633413, from Ithaca to Charlotte, Departure Time: 05:38, Arrival Time: 07:46"

breakfast.description: The name of a restaurant in the city, e.g. "Nagaland's Kitchen, Charlotte"

attraction.description: Use a ";" to separate different attractions, with each attraction formatted as "Name, City". e.g. "The Charlotte Museum of History, Charlotte;"

accommodation.description: e.g. "Affordable Spacious Refurbished Room in Bushwick!, Charlotte"
